subject: Automobile Racing
Automobiles
lead_paragraph: Jeff Gordon won his Nextel Cup series-leading sixth pole of the year yesterday after drawing the last spot for qualifying and waiting more than two hours to make his run for tomorrow’s 3M Performance 400 in Brooklyn, Mich. Greg Biffle went out just ahead of Gordon in the 48-car qualifying session, posting a lap of 188.684 miles an hour and knocking Kasey Kahne (188.516) off the top spot. Gordon, the points leader, then raised the top speed to 189.026.
